computerTopics.title: What is Computer?
computerTopics.description: A computer is an electronic device that processes data, stores information, and performs calculations or other logical operations according to instructions (programs).

computerTopics.title: Computer Components
computerTopics.description: A computer consists of hardware (physical parts) and software (programs and data). Key components include CPU, RAM, storage, motherboard, and input/output devices.

computerTopics.title: Types of Computers
computerTopics.description: Computers come in various forms: desktops, laptops, tablets, smartphones, servers, and supercomputers, each designed for specific purposes and performance needs.
